data.text: @EU_Commission It won't be around in 20 more
@EU_Commission EU=Rebirth of Nazism where freedom is restricted and the division of the population. Short of wearing Star of David badge indicating prejudice

@EU_Commission This awful #taxonomy is perverting the desired plot of the so-called #greendeal. If it weren't so sad, it could become a running joke. Nuclear sustainability lasts 1000s of years. Waf!!! Thx VdL, this shows your weak spine, all just opportunism.
@EU_Commission Money Rules Yeee 🥶 Watch Up Slaves

@EU_Commission In honor of this, we are declaring the 1st of January to be the Southern European Day of Remembrance for Victims of the Euro and Neoliberalism. Symbolizing the rejection of the Euro plutocracy and their economic values, it will also be known globally as "Brown Ribbon Day".

@EU_Commission This is exactly the opposite of what our capitalist system expects us to do! How will we keep the economy growing if we buy less & keep stuff for longer? Our objective here is to buy as much as possible. Products should last as little as possible, so that we can buy them again 🤔
@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN Well, she must be very disappointed today.
@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN Congratulations 🥳🥳👏👏

@EU_Commission No, go away.
